With K-Elements as a modular shortcodes you can get creative with unlimited combinations of easy-to-use shortcodes and quickly create any type of page you like.

Everything you need is included, just enable the feature from Admin panel[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Over 40 pages" icon_size="default" icon="doc"]Show online status of registered users in real time[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Unique Design" icon_size="default" icon="html5"]Buddypress & bbPress have never enjoyed such great attention to detail. Modern and clean design.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][kleo_grid type="4" animation="yes"][kleo_feature_item title="Extremely Flexible" icon_size="default" icon="popup"]You no longer need to be a professional developer or designer to create an awesome website. KLEO has all the tools to get you started.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Drag & Drop Page Builder" icon_size="default" icon="equalizer"]No coding required in building a professional website. Included as a plugin, K Elements provide unique elements to create awesome pages.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Free Updates" icon_size="default" icon="dropbox"]Many great features are yet to come to this theme so be the first to know about.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Outstanding Support" icon_size="default" icon="umbrella"]Join our happy community, get help and start learning new things. item.title: One Page Website
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row inner_container="no" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="lp-home-full-screen"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_color="#ffffff" type="color" bg_color="#000000" el_id="demos"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Choose a theme

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]

We created many pre-defined homepages to show endless possibilities of this product. Pick up one of them, or upload whole content just like on our demo version.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col light" text_color="#ffffff" type="color" bg_color="#8e44ad"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Pinterest style

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Futuristic Homepage with beautiful AJAX search shortcode element that allows you to search in pages, posts, portfolio, products and members. You'll definitely love our unique WordPress theme feature.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/pinterest/"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1411383486564{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}"][vc_single_image image="4323" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="large" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/pinterest/" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="alternate" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4331" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="large" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/home-default"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Community

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Need a community website? KLEO is definitely the solution to go with. You have an unique design and integration with BuddyPress and works like a charm with most BuddyPress compatible plugins.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/home-default"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" type="image" bg_image="3899" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

E-Learning

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Fresh design that can be used to create beautiful e-Learning website. You can use compatible plugin Paid Meberships Pro to restrict content and BuddyPress related pages.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/e-learning-home"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_images_carousel images="4327,4328,4329" onclick="custom_link" custom_links_target="_self" speed="5000" scroll_fx="crossfade" css_animation="fade" min_items="1" max_items="1" img_size="large" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" custom_links="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/e-learning-home"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="alternate" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4321" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="large" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/portfolio-full-width/" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Portfolio

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Showcase your portfolio with our nice portolio demo page. You have multiple options to choose from so your portfolio items will look impeccable.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/portfolio-full-width/"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4489" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="large" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/stylish-woocommerce/" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Stylish Woocommerce

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Have something to sell? Start an online store with KLEO powered by Woocommerce, the best e-commerce solution ever. Selling has never been easier.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/stylish-woocommerce/"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Ecommerce

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Have something to sell? Start an online store with KLEO powered by Woocommerce, the best e-commerce solution ever. Selling has never been easier.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/default-shop/"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4334" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="large" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/default-shop/" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="alternate" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4314" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="right-to-left" img_size="large" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/demo-agency/"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Agency (Multisite demo)

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]A creative demo with clean design that you can use for your Agency website or for your business.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/demo-agency/"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Simple Homepage

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Clean and simple presentation page. Do you have a small company and want a nice and clean design? Then this should fit your needs.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="VIEW DEMO" target="_self" style="see-through" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" size="lg" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/home/"][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4317" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="left-to-right" img_size="large" link="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/home/" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.05" padding_top="60" padding_bottom="60" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" type="image" bg_image="3750" enable_parallax="false"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]

Want more homepages?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][kleo_button title="Leave suggestion" href="http://kwiksurveys.com/app/showpoll.asp?qid=414595&sid=7svyyo255w7jznd414595&new=True" target="_blank" style="highlight" size="lg" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left" type="color" front_status="draft"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]SQ are granted the 'Elite Author' badge for their established reputation, overall quality, commitment to the market and the milestones they've hit in Envato Marketplaces where their products are currently being sold. Looking at the way we have come so far, we spotted some interesting numbers which might be worth a mention:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]3k active users on our support community[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]since 2013[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]5k purchases[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" text_align="center" section_type="main" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.2" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="80" min_height="0" border="bottom" css_animation="right-to-left" column_gap="no" text_color="#ffffff" type="image" bg_color="#000000" bg_image="2733" el_id="grid-layouts" enable_parallax="false"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Grid layouts

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]6 different grid versions included for much better purposes. Website can be in boxed or full width version[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1410969799139{border-bottom-width: 100px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_gallery type="grid" images="3797,3798,3799,3804,3805,3806" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" grid_number="6" img_size="320x274"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="60px"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

+

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

All the options above can be applied to full width or boxed layout styles

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][kleo_divider type="full" position="center" text="Full width 1440px"][vc_single_image image="3797" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="el-fade" img_size="320x274" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][kleo_divider type="long" position="center" text="Boxed 1440px"][vc_single_image image="3818" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="el-fade" img_size="320x274" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][kleo_divider type="long" position="center" text="Boxed 1200px"][vc_single_image image="3819" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="el-fade" img_size="320x274" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][kleo_divider type="long" position="center" text="Boxed 1024px"][vc_single_image image="3820" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="el-fade" img_size="320x274" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="60px"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

+

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Also you can have 100% Full Width sections

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][kleo_divider type="full" position="center" text="Full width 1440px"][vc_single_image image="3822" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_target="_self" css_animation="el-appear" img_size="320x444" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][kleo_gap size="60px"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

+

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

We push even more flexibility into this, now you can choose between different width styles of your main content in relationship with sidebars

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][kleo_divider type="full" position="center" text="Main content width for one sidebar pages: 75%, 67%, 58,3% and 50%"][vc_gallery type="grid" images="3799,3831,3832,3833" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" grid_number="3" img_size="320x274"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][kleo_divider type="full" position="center" text="Main content widths for two sidebars pages: 67%, 50% and 33%"][vc_gallery type="grid" images="3837,3836,3835" onclick="link_no" custom_links_target="_self" grid_number="3" img_size="320x274"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="main" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="80" padding_bottom="40" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Great for businesses of all sizes

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]

Kleo handles all the hassles of next gen website, perfect for beginners and experts alike

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="60px"][kleo_grid type="2" animation="yes" bordered_icons="yes" colored_icons="yes"][kleo_feature_item title="Membership Ready" icon="shield" icon_size="default"]Create Membership Levels and easily restrict content based on member access[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Facebook Login/Register integration" icon="facebook" icon_size="default"]Easily register or login with you Facebook account. Everything you need is included, just enable the feature from Admin panel[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Over 40 pages" icon="doc-1" icon_size="default"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Unique Design" icon="html5-1" icon_size="default"]Buddypress & bbPress have never enjoyed such great attention to detail. Modern and clean design.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Extremely Flexible" icon="popup" icon_size="default"]You no longer need to be a professional developer or designer to create an awesome website. Let your imagination run wild and create the site of your dreams. KLEO has all the tools to get you started.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Drag & Drop Page Builder" icon="equalizer" icon_size="default"]No coding required in building a professional website. Included as a plugin, K Elements provide unique elements to create awesome pages.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Free Updates" icon="dropbox" icon_size="default"]Many great features are yet to come to this theme so be the first to know about.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Outstanding Support" icon="umbrella" icon_size="default"]Join our happy community, get help and start learning new things. Also weâre constantly improving and adding new features. You get all the new versions for FREE life-time.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="yes" section_type="alternate" bg_position="top" bg_position_horizontal="left" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="60" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left"][vc_column width="1/1"][kleo_testimonials type="carousel" number="5" min_items="1" max_items="1" height="400"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" section_type="main" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="false" parallax_speed="0.1" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" min_height="0" border="none" css_animation="right-to-left" overflow="false" padding_left="0" padding_right="0" column_gap="no" vertical_align="yes" el_id="theme-support"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1409939767923{background-image: url(https://seventhqueen.com/demo/kleo/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/working.jpg?id=3067) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" font_color="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1409992623985{padding: 140px 100px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

Customer care

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" css_animation="right-to-left"]Faced a problem? No worries â our premium class customer support service is always ready to help you.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="10px"][kleo_button title="VIEW OUR SUPPORT FORUM" target="_blank" style="see-through" size="lg" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover" href="http://seventhqueen.com/support"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

NICE TO MEET YOU." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="My name is John Doe. I am a Spanish Digital Designer & Developer, focusing on Graphic Design and Web Design." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|line_height:44px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="20px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]I am currently working as a full time Graphic and Web Designer at Lorem Ipsum - Perspiciatis, a small but successful design agency in Spain. Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. You can follow me on Twitter, stalk me on Dribbble, listen to me on SoundCloud or just send me an Email.[/vc_column_text][kleo_button title="View selected work" style="see-through" size="lg"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type="alternate" type="color" padding_top="120px" padding_bottom="0" parallax_image="32464"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="DIGITAL DESIGN SERIES." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]To go along with my design skills, my toolbox is filled with acronyms you might be afraid of such as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and LESS. I love to see new standards appear and mature allowing the creation of new websites, each one more advanced and amazing than the previous. Page loading speed, display performance, responsive layout and SEO optimizations are part of my job, I take these issues at heart from the very beginning.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" section_type="alternate" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0"][vc_column][vc_media_grid style="pagination" items_per_page="4" element_width="3" gap="0" arrows_design="vc_arrow-icon-arrow_05_left" arrows_color="white" paging_design="none" loop="yes" autoplay="10" item="mediaGrid_ScaleWithRotation" filter_size="md" include="6369,6366,6365,6363,6362,6361,6360,6359" paging_animation_in="none" grid_id="vc_gid:1489077850057-cab8de87-671c-1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type="alternate" padding_top="120px" padding_bottom="0" parallax_image="32464"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="PIXEL PERFECT WEBSITES." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:92px|text_align:left|line_height:94px" google_fonts="font_family:Oswald%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text lead="yes"]To go along with my design skills, my toolbox is filled with acronyms you might be afraid of such as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and LESS. I love to see new standards appear and mature allowing the creation of new websites, each one more advanced and amazing than the previous.
